entities

Class Demon

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
        • city.cs.engine.Walker
          • entities.Enemy
            • entities.Demon

  • public class Demon
extends Enemy
    Represents a Demon enemy in the game with capabilities to attack the player. The demon has different states for idling and attacking and responds to player's actions. It maintains a count of hits taken and can switch between being alive and defeated.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void demonAttack()
      Initiates the demon's attack, changing its image to the attack image, playing the attack sound, and updating the attacking state.
      void endDemonAttack()
      Ends the demon's attack by reverting its image to the idle image and resetting the attacking state.
      int getHitsTaken() 
      void hitByAttack(boolean isSpecialAttack)
      Processes a hit on the demon by the player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Demon

        public Demon(city.cs.engine.World world,
             Player player)
        Creates a Demon in the game world and sets its initial state and image.
        Parameters:
        world - The game world where the demon will exist.
        player - The player character to interact with.

    • Method Detail

      • isDemonAttacking

        public boolean isDemonAttacking()
        Checks if the demon is currently in the attacking state.
        Returns:
        true if the demon is attacking, false otherwise.

      • demonAttack

        public void demonAttack()
        Initiates the demon's attack, changing its image to the attack image, playing the attack sound, and updating the attacking state.

      • endDemonAttack

        public void endDemonAttack()
        Ends the demon's attack by reverting its image to the idle image and resetting the attacking state.

      • getHitsTaken

        public int getHitsTaken()

      • isDemonAlive

        public boolean isDemonAlive()

      • hitByAttack

        public void hitByAttack(boolean isSpecialAttack)
        Processes a hit on the demon by the player. If it's a special attack, it is handled differently than a normal attack.
        Parameters:
        isSpecialAttack - true if the player performed a special attack, false for a normal attack.
